div.h2: WELCOME TO FRANKLIN COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOLS
div.p: FCPS would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the website by checking out some of our features including: calendars, news, and blogs. Subscribe to our Facebook, Twitter, or RSS feeds to receive updates on school and district information!

span.style: font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

a.title: Food Service Media Release contains information on meal availability.

div.div: Sign up Yearly starting in June.
New updates are available in Google and Apple Stores

div.p: The Franklin County School Board is committed to nondiscrimination with regard to sex, gender, race, color, national origin, disability, religion, ancestry, age, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law. This commitment will prevail in all of its policies and practices concerning staff, students, educational programs and services, and individuals and entities with whom the Board does business.
